script: You don’t need to be a UW partner to help others save or earn — and get rewarded for doing it. If you’re happy to introduce me to people who might benefit, I’ll do all the explaining and follow-up. You just connect us — I’ll do the rest!

Wondering who to refer? Think homeowners, people who’ve just moved, friends feeling the cost-of-living pinch, or anyone looking for a side hustle. If they pay household bills or want more time or money — they’re perfect!

What’s in it for you? I offer referral rewards if someone signs up, and you’ll be helping someone genuinely benefit — either by saving money, earning income, or both. Plus, you’ll be seen as someone in the know — a connector, a helper, a trusted contact.

Referring is super simple. You can send a quick group message, make an intro over WhatsApp, or let me know who to call. There’s no pressure or awkward pitch. Just connect, and I’ll take it from there.

If you’re in BNI or a networking group, you could say: ‘I’ve got a contact who helps people reduce their household bills or earn a Plan B income. If you know anyone moving house or feeling the pinch, let me know — I’ll connect you.’
